subject: Re: [junit] Genearting JUnit HTML reports
msgSnippet: I have same question also, somebody tell me that putting HTML should work. However that doesn t work for me.... ... [Non-text
messageBody:
I have same question also, somebody tell me that putting
<reportFormat>HTML</reportFormat> should work. However that doesn't work for
me....

>
